sect2.title: Contenu
sect2.para: The VTE package contains libvte libraries, vte and gnome-pty-helper

sect3.title: vte libraries
sect3.para: libvte libraries provide the functions necessary to implement a "termcap file" for terminal emulators.

sect3.title: vte
sect3.para: vte is a test application for the vte libraries.
